ARABIC: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He called out to his Lord, 'These are evildoing people.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he called to his Lord: "These are a sinful people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he called upon his Lord: “These are a criminal people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses addressed his Lord, saying, "Lord, these people are sinners".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He therefore prayed to his Lord, “These are a guilty nation!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So he (Musa) called upon his Lord (saying): "These are indeed the people who are criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he called upon his Lord: These are a guilty people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he called to his Lord, saying, 'These are a sinful people.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he cried unto his Lord, (saying): These are guilty folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then he cried out to his Lord, "These are sinful people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he called upon his Lord. these are a people guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he invoked his Lord, [saying,] ‘These are indeed a guilty lot.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (But they were aggressive:) then he cried to his Lord: "These are indeed a people given to sin."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (But they were aggressive), so he [Musa (Moses)] called upon his Lord (saying): "These are indeed the people who are Mujrimun (disbelievers, polytheists, sinners, criminals, etc.)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then he supplicated to his Lord saying: 'These are sinful people'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He appealed to his Lord: “These are a sinful people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:22] So he called to his Lord, saying, ‘These are indeed a guilty, an idolatrous, lot!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he cried unto his Lord (saying): These are a guilty folk) these are idolatrous folk who brought destruction upon themselves.
